title: Yubisaki kara Honki no Netsujou: Osananajimi wa Shouboushi
synopsis: Ryou Fujihashi wakes up to her apartment burning. Trapped within a deadly blaze with no means of escape, Ryou frantically makes as much noise as possible to alert her neighbors. Fortunately, someone has called the fire department, and they are speedily able to rescue her.
related_anime: ['Yubisaki kara Honki no Netsujou 2: Koibito wa Shouboushi', 'Yubisaki kara Honki no Netsujou: Charao Shouboushi wa Massugu na Me de Watashi wo Daita']
